Original title: Bullet to the Head
Country: USA
USA release: 01/02/2013
Released in Spain: 22/03/2013
Released on DVD (rental): 17/07/2013
Studio: Warner Bros. Pictures, Dark Castle
Directed by Walter Hill
Written by Alessandro Camon
Starring: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Momoa, Christian Slater, Sarah Shahi, Sung Kang, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje, Jon Seda, Brian Van Holt, Holt McCallany, Dominique DuVernay, Marcus Lyle Brown, Weronika Rosati, Don Thai Theerathada, Don Yesso, John L. Armijo
Rating: Not recommended for children under 16 years

Synopsis:
Jimmy Bobo (Sylvester Stallone) is a New Orleans hitman harsh and unforgiving. After his latest work, suffers an unexpected attack by Keegan (Jason Momoa), an unstoppable killing machine unceremoniously running mate (Jon Seda). Willing to take his revenge, Jimmy is forced to collaborate with Taylor Kwon (Sung Kan), a detective with the police so used to expeditious methods. But soon discover that Jimmy is the most effective weapon to end a dangerous organization that has corrupted the police and the upper echelons of the city.

Production notes:
- Film adaptation of the graphic novel "Bullet to the Head '(A bullet to the head), written by Matz and illustrated by Colin Wilson.
